description:
Popular singer who`s singles always make it to the Top 10 on the Galaxy Network`s music charts. Although skeptical http://anidb.net/ch49391 [Fire Bomber]`s songs initially, she eventually became acquainted with http://anidb.net/ch10993 [Nekki Basara] and http://anidb.net/ch14046 [Mylene Flare Jenius].
Source: http://macross.anime.net/wiki/Alice_Holiday
name: Alice Holiday
